Title: Authorizes certain local educational agencies to apply to the liquidation bureau to cover the costs of certain monetary liabilities
Summary: Provides that in certain circumstances, any local educational agency that is found subject to liability or enters into a settlement agreement for monetary penalties as the result of a claim brought against it for violations of the child victims act may seek direct reimbursement from the liquidation bureau.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to direct reimbursement of certain local educational agencies for claims of violations of the child victims act
